CustomObject.description:
C360:This is the Custom Setting for Customer 360 SObjects. This setting allows for the automated 360 process to include objects in the rollup summaries that are setup in the "customer 360 rollup mapping" custom setting.
When new objects need to be added to the process, a record can be added to this custom setting, and the specific fields added to the "customer 360 rollup mapping" custom setting to start bringing in summarized data to the 360 object.
CustomObject.label: Customer 360 SObjects
